title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 501/85 of 27 February 1985 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1124/77 redefining the destination zones for export refunds or levies and for certain export licences for cereals and rice
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 501/85
of 27 February 1985
amending Regulation (EEC) No 1124/77 redefining the destination zones for export refunds or levies and for certain export licences for cereals and rice
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Annex I of Regulation (EEC) No 1124/77 is hereby amended as follows:
1. Zone II (b):
'Greenland' is added;
2. Zone V (a):
'Upper Volta' is replaced by 'Burkina Faso';
Zone V (b):
'Rhodesia' is replaced by 'Zimbabwe'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 February 1985.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
